line.text:
Planned Work
[4] Woodlawn-bound trains run express from Burnside Av to Woodlawn

Days, 10:45 AM to 3 PM, Mon to Fri, May 5 - 9

No Woodlawn-bound service at 183 St, Fordham Rd, Kingsbridge Rd, Bedford Pk Blvd
and Mosholu Pkwy.

For service to these stations, take the [4] to Woodlawn and transfer to a Crown Hts-bound [4].

For service from these stations, take the [4] to Burnside Av and transfer to a Woodlawn-bound [4].

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

Planned Work
[J] Jamaica Center-bound trains skip Hewes St, Lorimer St and Flushing Av
[M] Middle Village-bound trains skip Hewes St, Lorimer St and Flushing Av

Days, 9:45 AM to 3 PM, Thu and Fri, May 8 - 9

For service to these stations, take the [J] or [M] to Myrtle Av and transfer to a
Manhattan-bound [J] or [M].

For service from these stations, take the [J] or [M] to Marcy Av (with Unlimited Ride MetroCard only)
or Essex St and transfer to a Jamaica Center-bound [J] or Middle Village-bound [M].

Alternate travel note:
From these stations, take the B46 bus to Myrtle Av for [J] [M] service.

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

Alternate travel note:
[R] service is also available at 5 Av/59 St and Lexington Av/59 St.

Coney Island-bound [N].

For service from these stations, take the [N] to Queensboro Plaza and transfer
to an Astoria-bound [N].

Note: No [Q] service at these stations during this time.

line.name: B1 - B84
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 05/08/2014  2:07PM

B52 buses detour due to crane operations at Gates Av between Nostrand Av and Bedford Av.

Detour is as follows:


Westbound: via Gate Av, left Nostrand Av, right Monroe St, right Bedford Av, left Gates Av and regular route.

Eastbound: via Gates Av, left Bedford Av, right Quincy St, right Nostrand Av, left Gates Av and regular route.

All detoured buses will make corresponding stops.

Allow additional travel time.

Detour is as follows:

Southbound: Via Wilson Av, right on Melrose St, left on Central Av, left on DeKalb Av, right onÂ Wilson Av and regular route.

Â

Northbound: Via Wilson Av, right on DeKalb Av, left on Knickerbocker Av, left on Flushing Av, right on Morgan Av and regular route.

Â

AllÂ corresponding stops will be made.

Â

Allow additional travel time.

line.name: Danbury
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 04/03/2014  6:13PM

A temporary Danbury schedule will be in effect starting Saturday, March 1, until further notice, to provide a more reliable service while contractors for Metro-North and the Connecticut Dept. of Transportation (ConnDOT) work to resolve the problem with the new grade crossing system. This problem has necessitated "Stop and Warn" procedures to ensure safe train movements past each crossing, resulting in delays. The schedule will include time adjustments for most weekday peak-period trains as well as substitute busing for weekday off-peak and weekend service. For more information, visit http://tinyurl.com/lf8tthl
